PROFILE

Nice to meet you..I'm Obasi Basil a graduate of Computer Science from the Federal University of Technology, Owerri, Nigeria. Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Javascript, React and more. Web Development is the career path that I have chosen to travel in this journey called life, and I intend to give more value to society and the profession, while deriving joy and fulfillment from the vocation. Having said this, I want to, in the future, contribute my own quota to setting and meeting enviable technological methodologies in the design, building and managing of large Computer Softwares and Web Applications.
